result.title: Advanced concept on deep institutionalization of RRI
result.description: This deliverable will consist of a discussion paper summarizing and developing further the conceptual state of the art of the concept “deep institutionalization” and its application to RRI orientations and practices. It will include a typology for the deep institutionalization of RRI (by Month 6), reflected by the experiences made in the stakeholder workshops in WPs 2-5 (by Month 24).

result.title: Synthesis on existing good RRI practices
result.description: Deliverable 1.2 synthesises the state of the art on good RRI practices in the form of a good practices report, consisting of two major parts: A first part describes the RRI state of play at Fraunhofer and TNO from the perspective of the actors involved. A second part documents the insights gained from the further similar research institutions in a comparative manner.
